title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 145-1.2 - Examinations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 145-1.2 - Examinations

State Regulations

Examinations for Regents scholarships shall be held each
year at such centers and at such times as the commissioner may direct. To be
eligible to receive such a scholarship, a candidate shall take the examination
prescribed for the competition, except as otherwise provided in section
145-1.10
(b) of
this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
145-1.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
